title: Ad volume on games and apps
content:
I've noticed that the ad volume follows the master volume setting on my phone rather than the in-app volume setting.

This is a problem because I would then have to lower the master volume on my phone when I use or play on such apps if I don't want to disturb others (on public transport or at night). If I forget to raise the volume when I am done, I will tend to miss calls and other notifications.

I think in-app ads should follow the sound settings of the app itself.
